Talents.Name: Silent Sentinel
Talents.Description: Applies 10% Sanctuary to allies within Attack Range; effect increases as ally's HP decreases (reaches maximum of 24% Sanctuary when below 30% HP)

Talents.Name: Plumes of Plenty
Talents.Description: Allies with less than 50% HP within this unit's Attack Range heals HP equal to 5% of this unit's ATK every second; effect doubles for [Rhine Lab] Operators
